card.note: You have many gifts and talents and I know you'll use them wisely
card.author: Aunt Becky

card.note: You are a blast to hang out with!/RJoy walks into a room with you.
card.author: Aunt Becky

card.note: She has always been a great example of how to treat everyone the same. It is a great trait.
card.author: Uncle mike

card.note: Your drive.
card.author: Allison

card.note: Hailey you are one those young women that makes everyone you come in contact with feel lovable. You glow with the love of Jesus which makes you beautiful inside and out. And Hailey Margaret, you are a true reflection of your mema, she would be so proud of you as we are!
card.author: Love Uncle Danny and Anut Margie

card.note: I love the commitment you've shown to church and the youth group for so many years; through thick and thin. I didn't find those awesome pics of you in middle school for no reason! I'm so proud of the young lady you've become! Continue to persevere in Christ. Much love
card.author: Andrew Cross

card.note: Oh the places you'll go!
card.author: Dr. Seuss

card.note: Hailey,/RWe are very proud of your accomplishments and of the woman you've become. We know you'll do great things. You're intelligent, a hard worker and a great student, so we know youll be just fine. /RWe love you!
card.author: steven and nicole coward

card.note: This one is tuff. I like everything about Hailey. She is a credit to our family. She gives love unconditionally and is loved unconditionally. The best thing that I like is the joy that I see in other people whenever she is around.
card.author: Uncle Mike

card.note: She looks like she walked out of the Disney movie - Brave. Disney needs to sign her for the live action remake!
card.author: Aunt Janice & Uncle Ricky

card.note: She has a way of making you feel special instead of it being all about Hailey.
card.author: The Tysons

card.note: She is always ready to go on vacation with the Tysons and she always brings with her a good time. Hailey, where do we go next?
card.author: Tysons

card.note: You light up the room when you walk into it. You will be a blessing to others that you meet. We are looking forward to your next step in life. Remember to keep God first.
card.author: Uncle Ricky & Aunt Janice

card.note: Okay, let us be serious....YOU ARE AWESOME. What else can be said?
card.author: Aunt Janice

card.note: Your positive attitude and cheerfulness always lightens up a room
card.author: Aunt Leslie

card.note: She's smart and always plays with me
card.author: Donaldson

card.note: I most like how no matter what we can always have fun together! Congrats on finally making it through one school and you'll do great at the next one.
card.author: Kyle Tyson

card.note: Congrats and love to a beautiful young women who is funny and smart and so kind. How do I know these things about Hailey. Mema told me so. Hailey was the sunshine of her life. Wishing you the best in your future endeavors. I know you will succeed. Love you,
card.author: Aunt Judy

card.note: I hope it doesn't annoy you when people say we're so similar. I've always thought of it as a great compliment.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: You'll probably find that this "growing up" business can be pretty overrated, but you'll always have your family. Let me know if I need to come down there and punch anyone in the face.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: Ooooooh, college. This is when crap gets fun. Have as much of it as you can. Just remember - don't drink anything made in a bathtub. That's just disgusting.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: You're awesome. Like... for real.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: I'm jealous of your metabolism.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: "The nitrogen in our DNA, the calcium in our teeth, the iron in our blood, the carbon in our apple pies were made in the interiors of collapsing stars. We are all made of star stuff."
card.author: Carl Sagan

card.note: "Once you can accept the universe as matter expanding into nothing that is something, wearing stripes with plaid comes easy."
card.author: Albert Einstein

card.note: When times get tough, just listen to Les Mis and think about how much worse they could be.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: Josh Hutcherson would be lucky to get to date you.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: You're always welcome to crash on my couch.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: Never stop learning.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: You have always been my favorite!
card.author: Allison

card.note: I like your hair
card.author: David

card.note: You are really smart, you should see Jurassic Park with me/R
card.author: Jonathan

card.note: We adore you! Have fun! Let me know if I need to kick someone's @#$!
card.author: Allison

card.note: I can't make this stuff up.../R/RFrom Jonathan- you remind him of a trex, very strong and fast
card.author: Jonathan

card.note: Don't be afraid to change your mind about anything. The world is so much bigger than we realize.
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: We love you
card.author: More people than you realize

card.note: Wow, look how pretty that girl's hair is!
card.author: Basically anyone that looks at you

card.note: Message me any time you need someone to talk to. Don't even try to call. No one uses phones as phones anymore./R/R(ok fine, you can call if you want)
card.author: Cynthia

card.note: I'll always be here for you. If you need anything at all, never hesitate to tell me. You are my best friend and I'll miss you
card.author: STACEY

card.note: Hailey is awesome
card.author: Patrick

card.note: I will make the drive or plane ride happen if you need me to beat someone up. I'll take Cynthia and Allison with me
card.author: Stacey

card.note: Never put your drink down.
card.author: Stacey

card.note: When you miss me just listen to the Jonas Brothers
card.author: Stacey

card.note: Hailey's sense of adventure. From riding the monkey cages Ferris wheel with Aunt Karen, finding a revolving door to go through in SF and growing into a beautiful young woman. I send my love and good wishes for your future.
card.author: Aunt Karen

card.note: What do I like about Hailey that's easy she's perfect. If you don't beleive me just ask her. She'll tell you how right I am. Remember to always dent your soda can. /R
card.author: Favorite uncle Tim, Love Always
